text: Koly potuzhnyy dokaz prybuvaye yim, yak kazhut聞, "My ne povirymo, yakshcho ne my dayemosya shcho dayet聞sya BOZHYM kur'yeram!" BOH znaye tochno khto ye krashchyy kvalifikovanyy dostavyty Yoho povidomlennya. Taki zlochyntsi zaznayut聞 zmenshennya u BOHU, ta strashnomu retribution yak naslidok yikhn聞oho zla zamyshlyayuchoho
